description: Manage Azure Site Recovery Jobs for the vault.

commands.name: az site-recovery job cancel
commands.summary: The operation to cancel an Azure Site Recovery job.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery job cancel [--ids]
                            [--job-name]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery job cancel --job-name job_id -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery job export
commands.summary: The operation to export the details of the Azure Site Recovery jobs of the vault.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery job export [--affected-object-types]
                            [--end-time]
                            [--fabric-id]
                            [--ids]
                            [--job-name]
                            [--job-output-type {Excel, Json, Xml}]
                            [--job-status]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--start-time]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--timezone-offset]
                            [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery job export -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery job list
commands.summary: List the list of Azure Site Recovery Jobs for the vault.
examples: az site-recovery job list -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery job restart
commands.summary: The operation to restart an Azure Site Recovery job.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery job restart [--ids]
                             [--job-name]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--subscription]
                             [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery job restart --job-name job_id -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery job resume
commands.summary: The operation to resume an Azure Site Recovery job.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery job resume [--comments]
                            [--ids]
                            [--job-name]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery job resume --job-name job_id -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery job show
commands.summary: Get the details of an Azure Site Recovery job.
examples: az site-recovery job show -g rg --vault-name vault_name --job-name job_id
